jasonxu.string.name: String Extension
jasonxu.string.toLowercase: convert all letters in [STR] to lowercase
jasonxu.string.toUppercase: convert all letters in [STR] to uppercase
jasonxu.string.charCodeAt: get the character encoding of the [INDEX] character in string [STR]
jasonxu.string.fromCharCode: get the character by character encoding [CODE]
jasonxu.string.toDecimal: Convert [NUM] in base [BASE] to decimal number
